name: otrs
label: OTRS
description: OTRS is a service management suite. OTRS connector provides functionality to create, modify, and search tickets.

fields.title: Server URL
fields.name: url
fields.description: Specify the URL of the OTRS server to connect and perform the automated operations.

fields.title: Username
fields.name: username
fields.description: Specify the username for your account to access the OTRS server to connect and perform the automated operations.

fields.title: Password
fields.name: password
fields.description: Specify the password for your account to access the OTRS server to connect and perform the automated operations.

fields.title: Verify SSL
fields.name: verify_ssl
fields.description: Specifies whether the SSL certificate for the server is to be verified or not. By default, this option is set as True.

operations.title: Create Ticket
operations.description: Creates a new OTRS ticket that contains mandatory data on OTRS based on the title, queue, state, priority, and other input parameters you have specified.

parameters.title: Title
parameters.name: title
parameters.description: Specify the title of the ticket you want to create in OTRS.

parameters.title: Queue
parameters.name: queue
parameters.tooltip: Queue for this ticket to go into.
parameters.description: Specify the queue in which you want to create the ticket in OTRS.

parameters.title: State
parameters.name: state
parameters.description: Select the state of the ticket you want to create in OTRS. You can choose from options such as, new, open, active, in progress, pending approval, etc.

parameters.title: Priority
parameters.name: priority
parameters.description: Select the priority of the ticket you want to create in OTRS. You can choose from options such as 2-low, 3-normal, 5-very high, etc.

parameters.title: Customer User
parameters.name: customer
parameters.tooltip: Name of the customer user for this ticket.
parameters.description: Specify the name of the customer to be added to the ticket you want to create in OTRS.

parameters.title: Article Subject
parameters.name: article_subject
parameters.tooltip: Subject text to use for this ticket's initial article.
parameters.description: Specify the subject text to be added to the internal article of the ticket you want to create in OTRS.

parameters.title: Article Body
parameters.name: article_body
parameters.tooltip: Body text for this ticket's initial article.
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify the body text to be added to the internal article of the ticket you want to create in OTRS.

parameters.title: Custom Field
parameters.name: dynamicField
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify other fields in the JSON format that you want to add to the ticket you want to create in OTRS.

parameters.title: Ticket-Type
parameters.name: newTicketType
parameters.description: (Optional) Select the type of ticket you want to create in OTRS. You can choose from the following options: Network Alert (NIDS), Vulnerability (VAS), DC, or Others.

parameters.title: Article Sender Type
parameters.name: articleSenderType
parameters.tooltip: Customer or Staff. Refer to OTRS implementation for Articler's SenderType.
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify the customer or staff to be added as the sendertype to the internal article of the ticket you want to create in OTRS. Refer to OTRS implementation for Article's SenderType.

parameters.title: DynamicField
parameters.name: newDynamicField
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify JSON data for DynamicField for the ticket you want to create in OTRS. Check OTRS implementation for DynamicField.

operations.title: List Tickets
operations.description: Retrieves tickets from OTRS based on the ticket title, state, ticket type, and other input parameters specified.

parameters.title: State
parameters.name: state
parameters.description: Select the state or states of the tickets you want to retrieve from OTRS. You can choose either one option or multiple options from the listed options such as, new, open, active, in progress, pending approval, etc.

parameters.title: Title
parameters.name: ticket_title
parameters.description: Specify the title of the ticket you want to retrieve from OTRS.

parameters.title: Type
parameters.name: tickettype
parameters.description: Specify the type of ticket that needs to be searched in OTRS. Select the type or types of tickets you want to retrieve from OTRS. You can choose either one option or multiple options from the listed options, which are Network Alert (NIDS), Vulnerability (VAS), DC, or Others.

parameters.title: Time Span Minutes
parameters.name: timeSpanMinutes
parameters.tooltip: Tickets history entries that created less than 'Time Span Minutes' minutes ago in OTRS.
parameters.description: Specify the time span in minutes based on which you want to retrieve tickets created in OTRS. This operation will retrieve those tickets whose history entries were created in OTRS less than the minutes specified in the 'Time Span Minutes' field.

operations.title: Get Ticket
operations.description: Retrieves a particular ticket from OTRS based on the ticket ID you have specified.

parameters.title: Ticket ID
parameters.name: ticket_id
parameters.description: Specify the ID of the ticket that you want to retrieve from OTRS.

operations.title: Update Ticket
operations.description: Updates data in an existing OTRS ticket based on the ticket ID, title, queue, and other input parameters specified.

parameters.title: Ticket ID
parameters.name: ticket_id
parameters.description: Specify the ID of the ticket that you want to update in OTRS.

parameters.title: Title
parameters.name: title
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify the title of the ticket you want to update in OTRS.

parameters.title: Queue
parameters.name: queue
parameters.tooltip: Queue for this ticket to go into.
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify the queue in which you want to update the ticket in OTRS.

parameters.title: State
parameters.name: state
parameters.description: (Optional) Select the state of the ticket you want to update in OTRS. You can choose from options such as, new, open, active, in progress, pending approval, etc.

parameters.title: Priority
parameters.name: priority
parameters.description: (Optional) Select the priority of the ticket you want to update in OTRS. You can choose from options such as 2-low, 3-normal, 5-very high, etc.

parameters.title: Customer User
parameters.name: customer
parameters.tooltip: Name of the customer user for this ticket.
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify the name of the customer to be added to the ticket you want to update in OTRS.

parameters.title: Article Subject
parameters.name: article_subject
parameters.tooltip: Subject text to use for this ticket's updated article.
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify the subject text to be added to the internal article of the ticket you want to update in OTRS.

parameters.title: Article Body
parameters.name: article_body
parameters.tooltip: Body text for this ticket's updated article.
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify the body text to be added to the internal article of the ticket you want to update in OTRS.

parameters.title: Ticket-Type
parameters.name: newTicketType
parameters.description: (Optional) Select the type of ticket you want to update in OTRS. You can choose from the following options: Network Alert (NIDS), Vulnerability (VAS), DC, or Others.

parameters.title: DynamicField
parameters.name: newDynamicField
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify JSON data for DynamicField for the ticket you want to update in OTRS. Refer to the OTRS implementation for DynamicField.

parameters.title: OTRS Article
parameters.name: oTRSArticle
parameters.tooltip: It a reply article to an OTRS ticket.
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify the reply article to the existing OTRS ticket. Refer to the OTRS Article schema.
